headline: Everest Appoints John Howard to Board of Directors
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, March 06, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, announced that John Howard has been appointed as an independent, non-executive member of its Board of Directors, effective today.
